# highlightedSubjects

**Instance Property**

All highlighted subjects in the overlay view’s image.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var highlightedSubjects: Set<ImageAnalysisOverlayView.Subject> { get set }
```

## Managing image subjects

- **beginSubjectAnalysisIfNecessary()**: Begins subject analysis on the overlay view’s image.
